item.title: YouTube Chanel Optimization Specialist Needed - Upwork
item.description:
YouTube Chanel Optimization

Are you passionate about optimizing YouTube channels and increasing viewer engagement? We're looking for an experienced YouTube Channel/Podcast Optimization Specialist to join our team! We recently launched a brand-new podcast channel on YouTube and need a skilled professional to help us drive traffic, increase subscriptions, and optimize our episodes for maximum reach.

Responsibilities
Channel Optimization:
Audit the current YouTube channel and identify areas for improvement.
Optimize channel settings, metadata, and layout to enhance visibility and user experience.
Develop and implement a strategic plan to increase channel traffic and subscriptions.
Episode Optimization:
Optimize individual podcast episodes, including titles, descriptions, tags, and thumbnails.
Implement SEO best practices to improve search ranking and discoverability.
Analyze performance metrics and adjust strategies accordingly.
Content Strategy:
Collaborate with the content team to develop engaging and relevant content.
Provide insights and recommendations based on audience analytics and trends.
Assist in the creation of promotional content to drive engagement.
Engagement and Community Building:
Develop strategies to foster community engagement and interaction.
Monitor and respond to viewer comments and feedback in a timely and professional manner.
Organize and execute community-building initiatives such as Q&A sessions, giveaways, and collaborations with other creators.

Requirements
Proven experience in optimizing YouTube channels and content.
Strong understanding of YouTube SEO and analytics.
Proficiency in video editing and thumbnail creation.
Excellent communication and collaboration skills.
Ability to analyze data and make data-driven decisions.
Experience in community management and engagement.

If you have a proven track record of optimizing YouTube content and driving viewer engagement, we'd love to hear from you! Please submit your resume, a cover letter detailing your experience, and any relevant work samples or case studies.

We look forward to welcoming a talented YouTube Podcast Optimization Specialist to our team. Thank you for considering this opportunity!



Posted On: June 16, 2024 18:12 UTC
Category: Social Media Marketing
Skills:YouTube, Instagram Story, Social Media Engagement, YouTube Development, YouTube Marketing, YouTube Monetization, YouTube Automation
Skills: YouTube, Instagram Story, Social Media Engagement, YouTube Development, YouTube Marketing, YouTube Monetization, YouTube Automation
Country: United States
click to apply

item.title: Rockstar Video Editor Needed for Ads and TikToks - Upwork
item.description:
We're a direct-to-consumer ecommerce brand and we need to find an exceptional video editor to help us create engaging content for TikTok and video ads.

You're a great fit if you:
- Have a strong portfolio of viral or highly engaging TikToks
- Can turn raw videos into short, captivating content
- Understand how to create ads for wellness ecommerce brands
- Are proactive and full of creative ideas

Responsibilities:
- Edit raw footage into compelling TikTok videos and ads
- Collaborate with our team to ensure content aligns with our brand
- Stay updated on TikTok trends and best practices
- Bring creative suggestions to enhance content engagement

Looking forward to hearing from you!




Posted On: June 16, 2024 17:59 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:TikTok Video, Short Video Ad, Video Editing, Motion Graphics
Skills: TikTok Video, Short Video Ad, Video Editing, Motion Graphics
Country: United States
click to apply

item.title: Short music video with just some pictures and videos (and perhaps some texts) - Upwork
item.description:
3-minute video with pictures and videos of a property. This will be quite a rush project with 12-18 hour turn around. I will be able to give all the photos/video clips by June 17th in the evening (Eastern Standard Time), and then hoping to get the first draft after 12 hours. And then finalize by June 18th as well.

We already have the song choice (you might just need to trim out some parts).

Not really a complicated project. I would just likely check on transitions, and possibly ask assistance in improving picture/video brightness, etc.

Your portfolio will be helpful so I can select a great candidate. I might have potential projects like this in the future.

Budget: $30
Posted On: June 16, 2024 17:56 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Video Editing, Photo Slideshow, Music Video, Video Post-Editing
Skills: Video Editing, Photo Slideshow, Music Video, Video Post-Editing
Country: Philippines
click to apply

item.title: Video Content Creator in Dubai - English US or UK - Upwork
item.description:
We are a dynamic company based in Dubai seeking a charismatic and good-looking female Video Content Creator to be the face of our Social Media advertisements. The ideal candidate will be fluent in English (US or UK) and possess exceptional verbal communication skills.

Responsibilities include delivering scripts provided by our marketing team on camera, working with the videography team to produce high-quality videos, and assisting in the editing process. The candidate should be comfortable wearing our company t-shirt or other branded attire during video shoots.

Candidates must have the latest iPhone model and a professional microphone to ensure perfect audio and video quality. Previous on-camera experience is a must, along with creativity, professionalism, and a basic understanding of video production and editing software.

We offer a collaborative work environment, opportunities for professional growth, and a chance to be part of an innovative team.

The industry is Holiday Home Company.

Hourly Range: $28.00-$61.00
Posted On: June 16, 2024 17:55 UTC
Category: Video Production
Skills:Video Commercial, Real Estate Video, Promotional Video, Spokesperson Video, Explainer Video, British English Dialect
Skills: Video Commercial, Real Estate Video, Promotional Video, Spokesperson Video, Explainer Video, British English Dialect
Country: Italy
click to apply

item.title: Thumbnail Designer for YouTube Channel - Upwork
item.description:
Hey There! I'm Looking to hire an experienced Thumbnail Designer for a "Mens Travel Abroad" YouTube Channel.

Videos are similar to:

https://www.youtube.com/@DiscoverTheGlobe2024
https://www.youtube.com/@discoverglobeliving
https://www.youtube.com/@weGeo1998/videos

If you have experience creating thumbnails for YouTube Channels, feel free to apply and let's talk more details!

This is ideally a long term collaboration with good payment structure.

Looking forward to working with you,
Alex R.


Hourly Range: $15.00-$35.00

item.title: Video Ad for Client Testimonials - Upwork
item.description:
Looking for someone to create video advertisements for our short term rental property management company. We have the testimonials and may have a client or two willing to go on voice/video. Ideally, who we hire would have models or use AI as well to read other client's testimonials. This would be used on our website but also we would want additional videos for ads on social media and search engines.
